name: Werewolf Solitaire: Path to Redemption (DEMO)
description:
You have been condemned by the Goddess for your mishaps. You were turned into a wolf and must demonstrate your character in front of her to become human again.

Indeterministic future plans:

  • Extended BGM
  • More characters to play with different end goals and special events (with character selection and deck previews)
  • More cards
  • Distinct artwork for each card.
